original_title: A Party Record Packed with Sex and Sadness
overview: A high & low fidelity record of obsessions past & present.  A hooded man named Cobra Commander (drawn naked) and a boy with black glasses. A fanged woman and a girl in a rose colored wig. Heaven on Earth, Live to Tell, and headphones (worn naked). An airport terminal. An old Montgomery Ward catalog.  That old orange bedspread, the red flowered couch.
title: A Party Record Packed with Sex and Sadness
